name: Totally Accurate Battlefield VI Part Two: THE FINALE
name_original: Totally Accurate Battlefield VI Part Two: THE FINALE
description:
It's Been A LONG LONG Time After The Part One Released. This Is A Parody For The Upcoming Battlefield 6 As The Previous But It's Seems The Part Two Isn't Just A Parody Game, It's A Full Chaotic Game Full Of Action. After Some Many Months Of Development TABVI Part Two Is Now Available!  Also! TABVI Part Two Brings The Player To Make Choices That Will Change The Story Of The Game!

_____STORY_____

The Sergeant EX Guy After Killing And Eliminating All The EX Drones Find Something Really Weird! He Found A New Portal Which Dropped Him Into The New Action. The Drones Now Are Way  More Stranger! They Have Heavy Armor! Humans Get Cought By The Drones! They Are Now Hostages. Your Mission Is Simple, Kill All The Drones, Free All The Hostages, Save The World.
I Am Believing On You! You Can Do This Good Luck Sergeant!

NOTICE: AFTER YOU FINISH THE GAME WITH ANY OF THE ENDINGS CHECK THE 'STORY' BUTTON TO SEE WHAT HEPPENED NEXT!

______THE FEATURES OF Totally Accurate Battlefield VI Part Two: THE FINALE_____

-Checkpoints

-Achievements

-Dialog

-New Weapons

-More Action

-Story

-Player Can Choose  How The Story Ends

-Voice Actors

-Secret Ending (try to find it)

AND MUCH MORE WAITING FOR YOU!

_____CONTROLS_____

-----MOVEMENT------

WASD KEYBINDS

------CROUCH------

Press 'C' To Crouch

------JUMP------

SPACE KEYBIND

------WEAPON------

LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT AND RIGHT CLICK TO SCOPE

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS_____

________MINIMUM________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR : INTEL CORE i3 8100

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GT710 2GB LP- Radeon RX 550 2GB

•RAM: 4GB RAM

•DirectX: VERSION 11

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300 MB AVAILABLE SPACE

________RECOMMENDED________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR: INTEL CORE i5-6500

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTX 1050 3GB-R9 280X 3GB

•RAM: 6GB RAM 

 •DirectX: VERSION 11

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR MAC_____

•PROCCESOR: INTEL (64-bit)  CORE I5-6500 OR BETTER (it might run on intel core duo but with not a good experience)

•RAM: 2GB RAM OR MORE

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300MB AVAILABLE SPACE

•DISPLAY: ANY

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR LINUX_____

  • 3 GHz Dual PROCESSOR 
  • 4 GB RAM
  • GTX 1050 2GB/ RADEON RX  550 2GB
  • 1090 x 1080 RESOLUTION (or any)
  • LESS THAN 300 MB STORAGE SPACE
